reasoning: Reporting Kaposi's sarcoma incidence as proxy for clinically significant HHV-8 infection. GLOBOCAN 2005 data shows ~2.5 per 100k globally, with high geographic variation (much higher in sub-Saharan Africa due to HIV co-infection).
source: Ferlay J et al. (2010). Estimates of worldwide burden of cancer in 2008: GLOBOCAN 2008. Int J Cancer. 127(12):2893-2917
